title: Best of The Herd for Oct 08, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Oct 08, 2020
description:
Doug Gottlieb in for Colin

-What Tom Brady and LeBron James have in common

-Why isn't Deshaun Watson taking any blame for Houston's 0-4 start?

-The Cowboys got distracted by the shiny toy


Guest: Ryen Russillo, The Ringer
